column5: Lookin' to head up north of Buckhorn next weekend, and feel like changing it up  a bit and wanna try fishing with minnows. Does anyone know where to get some either in Peterborough or Buckhorn?

Bridgenorth Sports right at the causeway in Bridgenorth, its on your way to Buckhorn, after you get your minnows, head out of Bridgenorth going north, and take the Selwyn Road, right to the Buckhorn road, and turn left, it will take you right to Buckhorn
Bridgenorth Sports is the best place specially if your heading up to Buckhorn. Well it is the best place in my books for that neck of the woods. Happy Fishing
I seen a sign for a bait shop/taxidermy business directly beside Mainstreet Landing Pub. And speaking of the pub....one heck of a great spot to tickle the taste buds or wet the whistle.
Thanks guys! I'll check out that place in Bridgenorth.
Thats about the only place around for minnows. There is another small shop in lakefield, but I dont know the name. Its right on the main drag on the west side.  S.
If you are coming up via Bobcaygeon, there is Mark's Bait and Tackle Shop on hwy 36 just at the south end...
Trudes cottages and bait shop right in Buckhorn , beside three castles resort has always sold tackle and live bait!
